article: rory mcilroy has plenty of work to do in his pursuit of the legendary green jacket but he will have to remain patient in his bid to complete a career grand slam at augusta .
the world no 1 recovered from a shaky start to card a one-under-par 71 but finished seven shots behind first-round leader jordan spieth .
mcilroy must hope for the early runners to drop shots as he 's scheduled to go out in the penultimate group with phil mickelson and ryan moore at 6.48 pm -lrb- bst -rrb- on friday .
rory mcilroy and phil mickelson , right , go out in the penultimate group on friday .

abstract: masters 2015 starts on day two with ian woosman and erik compton .
former golf world no 1 tiger woods is set to feature at 3.30 pm .
rory mcilroy will start near the end of day two in group 32 at 6.48 pm .
